sentence.Network_en: Visitors remember a lean, cheerful figure on horseback urging on his men.
sentence.Network_cn: 访客们记住了一个瘦削、乐观的人骑在马上为他的手下鼓劲。

sentence.Network_en: "Come on, Grace," he was urging her, "don't wait, hurry up."
sentence.Network_cn: “快点啦，格雷丝，”他催促道，“别等了。快点。”

sentence.Network_en: Anti-racist campaigners are urging the Government to ban all far-Right groups.
sentence.Network_cn: 反种族主义活动家正在力促政府取缔所有极右组织。

entry.def: If you urge someone to do something, you try hard to persuade them to do it.

example.ex: They urged parliament to approve plans for their reform programme...
example.tran: 他们敦促议会批准他们的改革方案。

example.ex: He urged employers and trade unions to adapt their pay settlements to the economic circumstances.
example.tran: 他敦促雇主和工会根据经济条件调整工资方案。

entry.def: If you urge someone somewhere, you make them go there by touching them or talking to them.

example.ex: He slipped his arm around her waist and urged her away from the window...
example.tran: 他揽住她的腰，拉着她离开了窗边。

example.ex: 'Come on, Grace,' he was urging her, 'don't wait, hurry up.'
example.tran: “快点啦，格雷丝，”他催促道，“别等了。快点。”

entry.def: If you urge a course of action, you strongly advise that it should be taken.

example.ex: He urged restraint on the security forces...
example.tran: 他力主对安全部队设限。

example.ex: We urge vigorous action to be taken immediately.
example.tran: 我们强烈要求立即采取有力措施。

entry.tran: 强烈的欲望；冲动；迫切的要求
entry.def: If you have an urge to do or have something, you have a strong wish to do or have it.

example.ex: He had an urge to open a shop of his own...
I have often talked about why we want to be mothers, but none of us can describe the urge exactly.
example.tran: 我经常谈到我们为什么想做母亲，但没有一个人能准确地描述这种冲动。

means.word_mean: 1. a verbalization that encourages you to attempt something;

sentences.sentence: "the ceaseless prodding got on his nerves"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of earnestly supporting or encouraging

sentences.sentence: "his importunity left me no alternative but to agree"

auth_sentence.content: It is also urging airlines to share training costs.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is also urging airlines to share training costs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is also urging airlines to share training costs.

auth_sentence.content: The experts are urging consumers to take action now.
auth_sentence.res_content: The experts are urging consumers to take action now.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The experts are urging consumers to take action now.

auth_sentence.content: Urging his new pal...to vitalize a boring yuppie life.
auth_sentence.res_content: Urging his new pal...to vitalize a boring yuppie life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Urging his new pal...to vitalize a boring yuppie life.
